attributes.action: Keep sanctions on Russia until troops leave Ukraine and war reparations are made
attributes.additional_details:
The destruction caused by this illegal invasion is causing a humanitarian crisis in Ukraine but also internationally with the inability to grow and harvest grain in 2022.
There is evidence that Russia has used rocket scattered mines, cluster munitions, representing a danger to civilians for years to come. 
Without continued punishment Russia will not acknowledge the invasion to be illegal, so will not pay to compensate for the destruction of people's homes, businesses and lives.
attributes.background:
We request the UK Government to keep sanctions on the Russian economy and hierarchy until Russia agrees to:
Remove troops from all Ukrainian territories
Remove all unexploded munitions from Ukraine.
Make full reparation to rebuild the Ukraine’s infrastructure and compensate the people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Keep sanctions until Russia has fully compensated Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611996
